name: PARANOID: PLAYABLE TEASER
description:
Welcome to the playable teaser from the game : 

"PARANOID - Complete Edition."

A new complete remake from the "PARANOID" original game released on 2018,

with a lot of new features, a lot of better things, a really new experience will wait you.

This teaser is for you, for thoses who can't wait for the final game release.
Get ready for 2021, for a true, indie horror game, from us.

Don't forget to follow us and the game for see all the updates ! ^^

-Ngames Studios.

SUPPORT OUR WORK ON PATREON :
https://patreon.com/NgamesStudios

CREDITS :

Voices : Zeograd, Nadal
Main Dev/Creator : Nadal
Sound Design : Nadal
Original Soundtrack : Aaube
